name: mongoose-middleware
description: Middleware for mongoose that makes filtering, sorting, pagination and projection chainable and simple to apply

scripts.pretest: rm -rf lib-cov ; jshint lib/*.js ; jscoverage lib lib-cov
scripts.posttest: rm -rf reports ; mkdir -p reports ; MONGOOSE_MIDDLEWARE_COVERAGE=true mocha --check-leaks -R mocha-lcov-reporter -r ./test/common.js -u bdd ./test/lib/*.js | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
